column4: running ubuntu 12.04.1 and having trouble with HDMI audio, nvidia nforce 630i/7100 GPU, identifies card, lets me select it, but no audio plays. Using proprietary driver nvidia-current
cable is v1.4, audio works in windows
yeah, i can select it, but no sound plays, tried speaker-test on all hw channels with no luck, updated alsa, modified /etc/pulse/default.pa to include hdmi output, still no luck
